# [Interview #690: Twitter: Brandonothology collection, Entry #71](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=690#71)

#### cancer\_moon

What author inspired you the most in your writing?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Would it be cliched to say Robert Jordan? Because...well, it was Robert Jordan.
